title: Michael Gove – 2014 Comments on Absences from School
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Michael Gove, the then Secretary of State for Education, on 25 March 2014.
content:
There is no excuse for skipping school. We have taken action to reduce absence by increasing fines and encouraging schools to address the problem earlier.
